articles.title: Is the Afterpay share price a buy?
articles.description:
Afterpay Ltd (ASX: APT) shareholders have been on a wild ride in 2020. But is the Afterpay share price a buy today?
The post Is the Afterpay share price a buy? appeared first on Motley Fool Australia.
articles.content: What a ride it has been for Afterpay Ltd(ASX: APT) shareholders in 2020, with the Afterpay share price plummeting to lows of $8.01 in March, then rebounding to $70.18 per share at yesterday’s close. … [+3847 chars]
